title: How to add Bluetooth to my computer - Quora

response.answer_text: There are several places in China that you can get a Blutooth USB plug for 99 cents free shipping. May take 3–4 weeks to get one or more. Works in both Windows and Linux. With Windows you cannot send out media to another device, but you can connect it to a phone to use your computer speakers as speakers. In Linux no restrictions at all.
